allow: Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/gsudo/Current/gsudo.exe" powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-Process | Where-Object {$_Name -like ''*KOS*'' -or $_ProcessName -like ''*Kings*'' -or $_Path -like ''*Kings Online Security*''} | Format-Table Name, Id, Path -AutoSize")
